description:
This compact camping kit has everything you need to eat your meal on the trail. The bowl and plate press together to become a leak-proof container, so you can be sure your entire dinner will be there when you make it to camp.

  • Bowl, lid and spork are made of post-consumer plastic waste
  • Glass-filled nylon Switch Spork has a spoon on one end and a serrated edge fork on the other (so you can use it as a knife)
  • Leak-proof silicone gasket
  • Includes 690ml bowl, 561ml lid that doubles as a plate, 2-piece Switch Spork, and stretchy tether to hold it together
  • Dimensions: 17.1 x 17.1 x 5.7cm
name: UCO Eco Mess Kit 5-Piece
